text: Livets Ord, literally Word of Life, is a congregation within the Swedish Word of Faith movement. It was founded in Uppsala by Ulf Ekman on 24 May 1983. Ulf Ekman left in March 2014 to join the Roman Catholic Church. Between 1994 and 2014 the congregation ran its own seminary.Livets ord avvecklar teologistudier , Upsala Nya Tidning 12 February 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== *official website Category:Protestantism in Sweden Category:Uppsala Category:1983 establishments in Sweden
title: Livets Ord
